description.value: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered. If you critically hit your hunted prey with a ranged weapon, or hit it at least twice on the same turn with a ranged weapon, it's @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.
